pair.Prompt: What was the purpose of Article VIII of the agreement in United States v. Joint Traffic Association?
pair.Response: Response: The purpose of Article VIII of the agreement in United States v. Joint Traffic Association was to secure to each company party to the agreement equitable proportions of the competitive traffic covered by the agreement so far as legally possible. This was done in order to promote public interest and ensure fair play and equality among all persons, roads, and communities.
